page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN S.ELKINGTON
page.content: Very little unemployment here, local sources of work being mainly in the town of Louth, Deighton Close School or on the land.Occupations include:- Accountant,Artist, Adult Education Tutor Organiser,Baker,Bank Clerk, Builder,Butcher,Caterer,Chandler, Chartered Surveyor,Dis.Council Chief Executive,Domestic Help,Farm Estate Owner,Farmer,Farm Manager,Farm Worker, Farm Secretary, Factory Manager,Garage Assistant,Gardener,Groom, Home Help, Heating Engineer,Hotelier,Joiner, Knitwear Machinist,Lorry driver, Local Preacher, Magistrate's Court Secretary Market Researcher,Motor Mechanic, Nurse, Plastic Factory Worker, Painter and Decorater,Pest Controller, Primary School Headmaster,/Teacher, Pharmacist Secondary School Teacher/House Mother, Stockman,Sub.Postmaster, Student nurse Under Bank Manger, Village Shopkeeper.
